Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1980...
Traded from Los Angeles to Pittsburgh on 3/2/1981 (Going to LA: C G. Carter. Going to PIT: SS C. Ripken Jr., P S. Howe, CF J. Eisenreich)...
Injured on 6/13/1981 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/17/1984 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/17/1986 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1988, off Joe Price (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/1988, off Tommy Boggs (NYM)...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1995...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1997, off Sterling Hitchcock (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1997, off Brendan Donnelly (ATL)...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1997, hitting .307 with 13 HR, 79 RBI...
